meanings.definition: The state or quality of being tangent.
meanings.sent1: The tangencies of the two circles showed they were touching at one point.
meanings.sent2: The tangencies between the lines indicated a close connection.
meanings.sent3: The tangencies of the squares made them look like they were dancing together.
meanings.sent4: The tangencies of their ideas led to a creative collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The tangencies of the colors created a beautiful blend.

meanings.definition: The act or fact of touching at a single point.
meanings.sent1: The tangencies of the shapes made them intersect at one spot.
meanings.sent2: The tangencies of the objects caused them to meet briefly.
meanings.sent3: The tangencies of the fingers on the touchscreen were precise.
meanings.sent4: The tangencies of their paths in life brought them together unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The tangencies of the planets created a celestial alignment.
